milestones.title: TELL THE STORY.
milestones.subtitle: v0.1.2
milestones.text: It's time to start talking about Carmel and about what it is that we believe and what we're all about. We want to start unpacking some of the big ideas that make up the #CarmelStory, such as the Big Carmel Dream (#H>m), the main problem we're trying to solve (#HelpingChrisSleepAtNight) and the Unique Carmel Value Proposition (#TheCarmelWay).

milestones.title: SELL FIRST TOKENS.
milestones.subtitle: v0.1.1
milestones.text: We wanted to enable the very early adopters of the platform who signed up to the website in the previous week, to participate in the private sale. We did this by integrating the website with MetaMask and allowed our community to send Ether transactions to the Carmel Private Sale Ethereum address.

milestones.title: LAUNCH THE WEBSITE.
milestones.subtitle: v0.1.0
milestones.text: The #CarmelStory is officially launched at carmel.io . A global community is created and starts growing.
